statements: SELECT * FROM lobbying_activities;
SELECT id, lobbyist_name, organization FROM lobbying_activities;
SELECT interaction_description, lobbyist_name, organization FROM lobbying_activities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM lobbying_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT lobbyist_name, organization FROM lobbying_activities WHERE interaction_description LIKE '%meeting%';
SELECT * FROM lobbying_activities WHERE organization = 'TechCorp' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT lobbyist_name, organization, activity_date FROM lobbying_activities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY lobbyist_name ASC, activity_date DESC;
SELECT id, interaction_description FROM lobbying_activities WHERE lobbyist_name LIKE '%John%' OR interaction_description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM lobbying_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND organization IN ('TechCorp', 'InvestCo') ORDER BY lobbyist_name ASC;
SELECT organization, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM lobbying_activities GROUP BY organization HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT * FROM LobbyingActivities;
SELECT id, activity_name FROM LobbyingActivities WHERE lobbyist_name = 'Alice';
SELECT interaction_type FROM Interactions WHERE id = 100;
SELECT activity_name, lobbyist_name, date FROM LobbyingActivities ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT contact_name, interaction_date FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM LobbyingActivities WHERE lobbyist_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, activity_name, lobbyist_name FROM LobbyingActivities WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_type, contact_name FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, activity_name, lobbyist_name, date FROM LobbyingActivities ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, contact_name, interaction_date FROM Interactions ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM lobbying_organizations;
SELECT organization_name, sector FROM lobbying_organizations;
SELECT id, name, email FROM lobbyists;
SELECT lobbyist_id, activity_date, description FROM lobbying_activities;
SELECT * FROM lobbying_organizations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM lobbying_organizations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT organization_name, sector FROM lobbying_organizations WHERE sector = 'Technology';
SELECT name, email, organization_name FROM lobbyists JOIN lobbying_organizations ON lobbyists.organization_id = lobbying_organizations.id;
SELECT * FROM lobbying_organizations WHERE sector = 'Healthcare' ORDER BY organization_name DESC;

SELECT lobbyists.name, lobbying_activities.activity_date, lobbying_activities.description FROM lobbyists JOIN lobbying_activities ON lobbyists.id = lobbying_activities.lobbyist_id WHERE lobbying_activities.activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM lobbying_activities;
SELECT id, lobbyist_name, organization FROM lobbying_activities ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT activity_description FROM lobbying_activities WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM influence_monitoring WHERE red_flag = TRUE ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, contact_person, outcome FROM interactions WHERE date >= '2022-09-01' AND date <= '2022-09-30';
SELECT id, lobbyist_name, organization FROM lobbying_activities ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE outcome LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT target_person, relationship_description FROM influence_monitoring WHERE red_flag = true;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE party1='CompanyA' OR party2='CompanyA';
SELECT id, lobbyist_name, organization, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%M %d, %Y') AS formatted_date FROM lobbying_activities ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM lobby_interests;
SELECT interest_name, influence_level FROM lobby_interests ORDER BY influence_level DESC;
SELECT name, organization, contact_info FROM lobbyists WHERE organization = 'Tech Inc';
SELECT activity_type, lobby_date FROM lobbying_activities WHERE lobby_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT conflict_description, organization FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY organization ASC;
SELECT * FROM lobby_interests ORDER BY interest_name ASC, influence_level DESC;
SELECT name, organization, contact_info FROM lobbyists WHERE organization LIKE '%Tech%' AND lobbyist_id IN (SELECT lobbyist_id FROM lobby_interests WHERE interest_name = 'Technology');
SELECT activity_type, lobby_date, purpose FROM lobbying_activities WHERE lobbyist_id = 3 ORDER BY lobby_date DESC;
SELECT details, contact_person FROM interactions WHERE interaction_id IN (SELECT interaction_id FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE organization = 'Big Corp');
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE lobbyist_id = (SELECT lobbyist_id FROM lobbyists WHERE name = 'John Doe');
